mapper.select: select TOP 1 cost_dept_id from t_dx_settlement_match_detail where cost_no=#{costNo} and cost_amount-covered_amount>0

select id, cost_type, cost_type_name, cost_time, cost_amount, cost_use, cost_dept, cost_dept_id, covered_amount, cost_amount-covered_amount uncoveredAmount from t_dx_settlement_match_detail where cost_no=#{costNo} and cost_amount-covered_amount>0
mapper.update: update t_dx_settlement_match set covered_amount=covered_amount+#{costAmount} where cost_no=(select cost_no from t_dx_settlement_match_detail where id=#{id})
mapper.select: select count(1) from t_dx_settlement_invoice WITH(NOLOCK) where invoice_no=#{invoiceNo} and invoice_date=#{invoiceDate} and valid = '1'

select id, cost_time, cost_use, cost_amount-covered_amount costAmount, cost_type_name, cost_type, cost_dept_id, cost_dept, instance_id, bpms_id, project_code from t_dx_settlement_match_detail where id=#{id}
